001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.shapes;
002
003public interface Shape3D extends Shape {
004
005    default int getDimensions() {
006        return 3;
007    }
008
009    int getWidth();
010
011    int getHeight();
012
013    int getDepth();
014
015    static Shape3D of(Shape2D shape, int depth) {
016        return of(shape.getWidth(), shape.getHeight(), depth);
017    }
018
019    static Shape3D of(int width, int height, int depth) {
020        return new Shape3D() {
021            @Override
022            public int getWidth() {
023                return width;
024            }
025
026            @Override
027            public int getHeight() {
028                return height;
029            }
030
031            @Override
032            public int getDepth() {
033                return depth;
034            }
035        };
036    }
037}
